statements: SELECT * FROM employee_goals;
SELECT goal_name, goal_description, progress FROM employee_goals WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, goal_name, start_date, end_date FROM employee_goals WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, goal_name FROM employee_goals ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT goal_name, end_date FROM employee_goals WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, goal_name, goal_description FROM employee_goals WHERE progress >= 50 ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT goal_name, progress FROM employee_goals WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND end_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_goals WHERE goal_name LIKE '%development%' AND progress < 100 ORDER BY employee_id, progress DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, goal_name, end_date FROM employee_goals WHERE progress = 100 ORDER BY employee_id ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT goal_name FROM employee_goals WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_goals;
SELECT employee_id, goal_description FROM employee_goals WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY recorded_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_goals WHERE progress < 20 ORDER BY target_date ASC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 100 AND recorded_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_goals
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, target_date FROM employee_goals WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY target_date DESC
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, recorded_date FROM performance_metrics WHERE employee_id = 123 ORDER BY recorded_date ASC
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(metric_id) AS num_metrics FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_metrics > 3
SELECT * FROM employee_goals JOIN performance_metrics ON employee_goals.employee_id = performance_metrics.employee_id
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, due_date, progress_percentage FROM EmployeeGoals;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT employee_id, goal_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT employee_id, goal_id, progress_percentage FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE employee_id = 101 AND progress_percentage >= 50;
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, due_date FROM EmployeeGoals WHERE due_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EmployeeGoals WHERE due_date >= '2022-12-31' AND progress_percentage >= 50 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT goal_description, due_date, progress_percentage FROM EmployeeGoals WHERE progress_percentage < 100;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS goal_count FROM EmployeeGoals GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3 ORDER BY goal_count DESC;

SELECT EmployeeGoals.goal_description, PerformanceMetrics.metric_name, PerformanceMetrics.metric_value FROM EmployeeGoals INNER JOIN PerformanceMetrics ON EmployeeGoals.employee_id = PerformanceMetrics.employee_id AND EmployeeGoals.goal_id = PerformanceMetrics.goal_id;
SELECT EmployeeProgress.employee_id, SUM(progress_percentage) AS total_progress FROM EmployeeProgress GROUP BY EmployeeProgress.employee_id HAVING total_progress > 100;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT MAX(priority) AS max_priority FROM goals;
SELECT goal_description, priority FROM goals ORDER BY priority DESC;

SELECT employee_name, metric_name, metric_value FROM employees JOIN progress ON employees.employee_id = progress.employee_id JOIN metrics ON progress.progress_id = metrics.progress_id WHERE metrics.metric_value > 50;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT goal_description, priority FROM goals WHERE priority > 3 ORDER BY priority ASC;
SELECT m.metric_name, m.metric_value, p.progress_status FROM metrics m JOIN progress p ON m.progress_id = p.progress_id WHERE p.employee_id = 1 AND p.progress_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE department='Sales';
SELECT goal_name, description FROM goals WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, progress_percentage FROM progress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;

SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM departments JOIN employees ON departments.department_id = employees.department WHERE department_name IN ('HR', 'Marketing') GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees ORDER BY department, name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT e.name, p.metric_name, date_recorded FROM employees e JOIN performance_metrics p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
